Title: Relates to paid leave for menstrual complications and menopause
Summary: Relates to providing four days of paid leave for menstrual complications and menopause.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, add ยง204-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing four days of paid leave for menstrual complications and menopause
